change_email_form.title: Change E-mail
change_email_form.success_message: Check your old e-mail account to complete the change to the new one.

change_email_confirmation.success_message: Your e-mail address has been changed.
change_email_confirmation.requires_confirmation_from_new_email: Thank you for confirming your old e-mail address. To complete the change, you still need to confirm your new e-mail address.
change_email_confirmation.requires_confirmation_from_old_email: Thank you for confirming your new e-mail address. To complete the change, you still need to confirm your old e-mail address.

change_password_form.title: Change password
change_password_form.password_changed_success: You can now use your new password. (A notification was sent to your e-mail address.)

jail_set_password_form.title: Set a password
jail_set_password_form.explanation: You have not set a password for your account. Please create one to continue.

reset_password_form.success_message: Check your e-mail for a link to reset your password.

form.no_password_login_prompt: Check your e-mail for a link to log in. :)

basic_sign_up_form.sign_up_agreement_explainer: By continuing, you agree to our <2>Terms of Service</2>, including our cookie, e-mail, and data-handling policies.

username.username_taken_error: This username is already in use.
username.validation_error: Usernames can only have numbers or _, and have to start with a letter.

password.validation_error: Passwords must be between 8 and 256 characters, and not extremely common.

birthday.validation_error: Select a valid date in the past.

account_form.tos_prompt: To continue, please read and accept the <1></1>.
account_form.tos_accept_label: I accept the Terms of Service.

name.required_error: Only whitespace is not an acceptable name.

email.empty_error: Please enter a valid e-mail address
email.required_error: The e-mail field can't be empty.

jail.title: More info required
jail.description: Please check the following to continue.

terms_of_service_section.description: To continue, please read and accept the updated Terms of Service <1></1>.

sign_up_completed_prompt: Click the verification link sent to your e-mail address to activate your account.
sign_up_confirmed_prompt: All done. If you are not redirected, try logging in.
reset_password_success: Your password was deleted. Logging in now requires clicking the link sent to your e-mail address each time.
introduction_title: Join and help grow the new alternative to Couchsurfing™

gender_section.title: Change stated sex
gender_section.explanation: Admins need to make this change. Please contact support@couchers.org

birth_date_section.title: Change birthdate
birth_date_section.explanation: Admins need to make this change. Please contact support@couchers.org

timezone_section.title: Timezone and local adjustments
timezone_section.description: Your timezone is <1>{{timezone}}</1>. Based on this, your local time is approximately <4>{{time}}</4>.
timezone_section.explanation: This time and timezone is based on your home location. Please report a bug if it is incorrect.

username_section.title: Username
username_section.explanation: Your username was made when creating the account.

feature_preview.title: Feature Preview
feature_preview.explanation: Try features still in development, before they are ready for everyone.
feature_preview.disclaimer: These features are experimental, not work as intended, and change rapidly with development. Give feedback and report bugs on the forum.

no_previews.title: No features available
no_previews.explanation: There are currently no preview features. Please check back later.

status.enabled_message: The new notification system is <2>turned on</2> for your account.
status.disabled_message: The new notification system is <2>turned off</2> for your account.

action_button.enable_text: Turn on the new notifications system
action_button.disable_text: Turn off the new notifications system
